tool_description:
An API to fetch some fake products for a shopping website. 
Categories : Dress,Shoes,Bag,Accessories,Shirts
name: Shopping Data API
title: Shopping Data API

api_list.name: https://shopping-data-api.onrender.com/api/show-all-shirts
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://shopping-data-api.p.rapidapi.com/api/show-all-shirts"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "shopping-data-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: https://shopping-data-api.onrender.com/api/show-specific-product/{id}
api_list.description: Returns a specific product using ID
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://shopping-data-api.p.rapidapi.com/api/show-specific-product/1"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "shopping-data-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
